subject: Parent-Teacher Conference Reminder
summary: Your parent-teacher conference is scheduled for tomorrow at 3 PM. Please confirm your attendance and bring any questions you have about your child's progress.

subject: Appointment Confirmation - Annual Checkup
summary: Your annual checkup is confirmed for Friday at 10 AM. Please arrive 15 minutes early to complete paperwork. Remember to bring your insurance card.

subject: Game Cancelled - Weather Conditions
summary: Due to heavy rain and field conditions, this weekend's soccer game has been cancelled. We'll reschedule for next week and send an update.

subject: URGENT: Quarterly Report Deadline
summary: The quarterly report needs to be submitted by end of day today. This is a critical deadline that affects the entire team's performance metrics.

subject: Weekly Specials - Fresh Produce 20% Off
summary: This week's deals include 20% off all fresh produce and buy-one-get-one on dairy products. Valid until Sunday. Don't miss these savings!

subject: Appointment Reminder - Cleaning
summary: Your dental cleaning appointment is tomorrow at 2 PM. Please confirm your attendance. Remember to bring your dental insurance information.

subject: Field Trip Permission Slip Due
summary: The permission slip for next week's field trip to the science museum is due by Friday. Please sign and return with $15 for admission.

subject: Service Reminder - Oil Change Due
summary: Your vehicle is due for an oil change. Schedule your appointment today to maintain your warranty and keep your car running smoothly.

subject: Policy Renewal - Action Required
summary: Your auto insurance policy expires in 2 weeks. Please review your renewal options and confirm your coverage to avoid any lapse in protection.

subject: Class Schedule Update - New Yoga Times
summary: We've updated our yoga class schedule starting next week. New evening classes have been added to accommodate working parents.

subject: Suspicious Activity Alert
summary: We detected unusual activity on your account. Please review recent transactions and contact us immediately if you notice any unauthorized charges.

subject: Books Due - Overdue Notice
summary: You have 3 books that are overdue. Please return them as soon as possible to avoid additional late fees. You can renew online if needed.

subject: Test Google Fallback CTA
body: This is a test email with no links. Please trigger the Google fallback CTA.
htmlBody: This is a test email with no links. Please trigger the Google fallback CTA.
